scripts.dev: concurrently -n "contracts,frontend,agent" --colors "yellow,blue,green" "npm run dev:contracts" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:eliza"
scripts.dev:contracts: npm run contracts:compile && npm run contracts:copy-abi && npm run contracts:deploy:local
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd agents/eliza && pnpm install
scripts.contracts:deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network baseSepolia
scripts.contracts:deploy:sepolia: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network baseSepolia
scripts.setup:prod: npm run contracts:compile && npm run contracts:copy-abi && npm run contracts:deploy:sepolia
